text: Hamono cazoi kasone, ki ʙo Alloh va pajomʙaronas cang mekunand va dar zamin ʙa fasod mekusand, ja'ne rohzani mekunand on ast, ki kusta savand jo ʙa dor kasida savand jo dasthovu pojhojason jake az capu jake az rost ʙurida savad jo az sarzamini xud ʙadarƣa savand. In ʙaroi xor va sarmanda sudanason dar in cahon ast va dar oxirat niz ʙa azoʙi saxt giriftor xohand sud
